title: `brew bump --open-pr` fails to fetch repology data

labels.name: outdated
labels.description: PR was locked due to age

body:
### `brew doctor` output ```shell Please note that these warnings are just used to help the Homebrew maintainers with debugging if you file an issue. If everything you use Homebrew for is working fine: please don't worry or file an issue; just ignore this. Thanks! Warning: You have uncommitted modifications to Homebrew/homebrew-core. If this is a surprise to you, then you should stash these modifications. Stashing returns Homebrew to a pristine state but can be undone should you later need to do so for some reason. cd /opt/homebrew/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-core && git stash -u && git clean -d -f Uncommitted files: M Formula/a/antiword.rb M Formula/e/ecm.rb M Formula/f/fastbit.rb M Formula/j/jerm.rb M Formula/l/lbzip2.rb M Formula/l/lv.rb M Formula/n/negfix8.rb M Formula/r/rc.rb M Formula/s/skymaker.rb M Formula/t/tcptrace.rb ``` ### Verification - [X] My "`brew doctor` output" above says `Your system is ready to brew.` and am still able to reproduce my issue. - [X] I ran `brew update` twice and am still able to reproduce my issue. - [X] This issue's title and/or description do not reference a single formula e.g. `brew install wget`. If they do, open an issue at https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/issues/new/choose instead. ### `brew config` output ```shell HOMEBREW_VERSION: 4.2.16-69-gfcc190b ORIGIN: https://github.com/Homebrew/brew HEAD: fcc190b5c659d9c74454011f094de568789ef8fd Last commit: 13 hours ago Core tap HEAD: 8f58412c523bee27dbf22770c0944ff3dba75c8b Core tap last commit: 12 hours ago Core tap JSON: 04 Apr 07:36 UTC Core cask tap HEAD: 8797c74d6fc3fc7f9cf3d9c0c1afff7df240d7f0 Core cask tap last commit: 13 hours ago Core cask tap JSON: 04 Apr 07:36 UTC HOMEBREW_PREFIX: /opt/homebrew HOMEBREW_CASK_OPTS: [] HOMEBREW_DEVELOPER: set HOMEBREW_EDITOR: nano HOMEBREW_GITHUB_API_TOKEN: set HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS: 10 HOMEBREW_NO_ENV_HINTS: set HOMEBREW_SORBET_RUNTIME: set Homebrew Ruby: 3.1.4 => /opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/portable-ruby/3.1.4/bin/ruby CPU: 10-core 64-bit arm_firestorm_icestorm Clang: 15.0.0 build 1500 Git: 2.44.0 => /opt/homebrew/bin/git Curl: 8.4.0 => /usr/bin/curl macOS: 14.4.1-arm64 CLT: 15.3.0.0.1.1708646388 Xcode: 15.3 => /Applications/Xcode-15.3.0.app/Contents/Developer Rosetta 2: false ``` ### What were you trying to do (and why)? Tried to run `brew bump --open-pr mtbl` to update the version ### What happened (include all command output)? Got annoyed by the: ```console Warning: Removed Sorbet lines from backtrace! JSON::ParserError: unexpected token at ' 403 Forbidden

403 Forbidden

nginx
' ``` When running it with verbose it became clear that it came from this command: ```sh /usr/bin/env /opt/homebrew/opt/curl/bin/curl --disable --cookie /dev/null --globoff --show-error --user-agent Homebrew/4.2.16-69-gfcc190b\ \(Macintosh\;\ arm64\ Mac\ OS\ X\ 14.4.1\)\ curl/8.4.0 --header Accept-Language:\ en --retry 3 --location --silent https://repology.org/api/v1/project/mtbl ``` So it seems repology blocks brew bump. ### What did you expect to happen? a version update was created ### Step-by-step reproduction instructions (by running `brew` commands) ```shell brew bump --open-pr mtbl --debug --verbose ```
